Package eecs.jago

Provides the classes required for the simulation environment.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Realism This interface is implemented by any object that has functionality that matches a physical device.
 

Class Summary
CollisionDetector Determines if two objects have physically collided.
CollisionDetectorTest  
DisplayManager This class is responsible for updating the display of all elements, including the background image and any elements that are Visible.
DisplayManagerTest  
ElementManager This class is responsible for managing the link between the SimElements in the simulation, and the SimEngine itself.
ElementManagerTest  
ImageLoader  
ImageLoaderTest  
JagoSuite  
SimBox This is the main simulation window that contains the simulation and a text area that can be used for simulation (system) and user messages.
SimBoxTest  
SimEngine The simulation engine that is responsible for managing the addition, deletion, and updating of all elements of the simulation.
SimEngineTest  
TiledImage  
 

Package eecs.jago Description

Provides the classes required for the simulation environment. This package and the subpackages provide the functionality required to completely implement a simulation. Normally, classes will extend the eecs.RobotGui class to use the classes in this package, but the SimBox can be used independently.

Package Specification

No details.
